description.summary: A hearty and flavorful beef chili with beans, perfect for cold evenings. This traditional recipe combines ground beef with a rich blend of spices, tomatoes, and kidney beans for a warming and satisfying meal.

ingredients.ingredient: Optional toppings: shredded cheese, sour cream, chopped cilantro, diced onions

preparation.step: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Add the ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a wooden spoon, until browned and no longer pink, about 6-8 minutes. Drain excess fat if necessary.
Add the diced onion and bell pepper to the pot. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the minced garlic and cook for another minute until fragrant.
Add the chili powder, cumin, paprika, cayenne pepper (if using), salt, and black pepper. Stir well to coat the meat and vegetables with the spices, cooking for 1-2 minutes.
Pour in the diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, and beef broth. Stir to combine all ingredients.
Add the drained kidney beans and stir them into the mixture.
Bring the chili to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer for at least 1 hour, stirring occasionally. The longer it simmers, the better the flavors will meld together.
Taste and adjust seasonings as needed. Add more salt, pepper, or chili powder to your preference.
Serve hot with your choice of toppings such as shredded cheese, sour cream, chopped cilantro, or diced onions.
